attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Our pavements are covered in spit and phlegm causing the spread of germs.  The smokers that stand outside constantly spit, you bring all this filth into the house! it is disgusting and so unheigenic...Australia has a law against it, they fine you if they catch you, why can't we do the same.  No wonder diseases are on the increase like swine flu and others, how about stopping these spit that become airbourne?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
